content.raw: Something to note, just as we won't be supporting gazebo5 on precise due to an old default gcc, we will also have problems with Mac OSX 10.8 since it uses libstdc++ by default, while c++11 requires libc++. We should support OSX 10.9+ for gazebo5.
content.html: Something to note, just as we won't be supporting gazebo5 on precise due to an old default gcc, we will also have problems with Mac OSX 10.8 since it uses libstdc++ by default, while c++11 requires libc++. We should support OSX 10.9+ for gazebo5.
